_header: Saint Agatha the good maid in Sicily was I-bore
Subjects: Agatha, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Agatha in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynt Agace þe gode maide in cisile was iboreWel ȝong
                    cristene heo bicom & forsok sunne & hore …
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…As wisliche bidde we hire as heo þe contreie ȝef
                    boteþat we to te Ioie of heuene wiþ hire come mote

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Agace þat gode maide in Cisyle was i boreWel ȝong
                    cristene heo bi com and forsok sunne and hore…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…As wisliche bidde we hire as heo þe Cuntreye ȝaf
                    boteÞat we to þe Ioye of heuene wiþ hire come mote .
                    AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEinte Agace þat guode maide In cisile was i borewel ȝong
                    heo bi gan cristine to beon þat hire soule nere fur
                    lore…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Also wsliche we schullen hire bidde ase heo þe contreie
                    ȝaf boteÞat we to þe Ioye þare heo is Inne with hire
                    come we mote
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 193-7.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Agace þat maide In cicile was y boreWel ȝong
                    cristene heo bicam & forsok synne & hore…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…As wisliche bidde we hire as heo þat Contrey ȝaf
                    boteþat we to þe ioye of heuene to hire come mote
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint Agace þe holi mayde in Cesile was boreWol ȝong
                    cristen sche be com & for sok synne & ore…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…As wisli bidde we hire as sche þat cuntre ȝaf
                    boteÞat we to þe ioie of heuene to hire come mote

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
[S]eynte Agace þat maide in cicle was yboreWel ȝong
                    cristede ȝe bicam [ ]…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…As wisseliche bidde we S[eint] Agace sȝe þe contrey
                    ȝe ȝaf[ ]Þat we to þe ioye of heuene to hure come
                    mote
OxfCCC431.Note:
Text in second line lost due to glue stain and patch; other portions of
                    text lost due to mutilation of leaves.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Þe gude maiden saynt Agace in Cicil borne scho wasHo become
                    cristen ful ȝonge thurgh our lordeȝ graceOf faire berynge
                    þis maiden was & stable in goddeȝ loreÞe Duke of
                    þat lande when he it wyste þerof hym rewid sore…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Als weterly til hir we pray þat safed al þat
                    cuntretil pray for hym to ihesu criste in heuen þat we may
                    be

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seint agase þat maide in sicile was iboreWel ȝong
                    cristene he bicom & forsok sunne & hore…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…As wisliche bidde we hure as he þe contreie ȝaf
                    boteÞat we to þe Ioie of heuene to hure come mote
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.54.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Agace þe holy mayde in Sycyle was yboreWel ȝong
                    cristene ȝeo by com and fforsok synne & hore…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…As wyslich bydde we hure as ȝeo to þat contre ȝaf
                    boteÞat we to þe ioye of heuene to hure come mote

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint agathe þat mayde in cysile was yboreȜonge heo by
                    com cristyne & for soke synne & hore…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…As wysselyche bydde we hure as heo ȝaf to contre
                    boteþat we to þe ioie of heuene to hure com mote

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin agace þe gode maide in cisile was iborewel ȝong cristine ȝhe bicom & forsok sunne & hore…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …as wisliche bidde we here as heo þe countreie gaf boteþat we to þe ioie of heuen with here come mote
BLCottJulDIX.Note: No chapter number assigned by the later annotator.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Agate þe maide in Cizile was boreȜong cristene heo bicom and forsok sunne and hore…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …As wisliche bidde we hire as heo ȝaf þe contrei boteÞat we to þe ioie  of heuene to hire come mote

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint Agace þat holy maide in cisile was yboreWel ȝonge cristyn ȝe bycom þat hire soule ner vorlore…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …As ywisseliche bidde we hire as þe contray ȝe ȝaf boteþat we to þe Ioye of heuene wiþ hire come mote

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEint agace þat mayde In cisile was IboreWel ȝong cristene heo bicom and forsok sunne and hore…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …As wislyche bidde we hure as heo þe contreie ȝaf boteþat we to þe ioie of heuene to hure come mote

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Agas þat holy Mayde in Cisile was bornWel ȝonge she
                    cristen womon bicome þat hir soule nere lorn…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Pray we to þat holy virgyn þat to þat lond fond
                    boteÞat in þe lond þere she is with hir wone we mote
                    Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Agas þe good maide in Cicile was boreFul ȝonge
                    cristen she bicome & forsoke synne & ore…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…As wiseli preie we hur as she þe contre ȝaue
                    boteÞat we þe Ioye of heuene to hur at our ending come
                    mote
